    std::string row2;

    // Each child has 2 plants per row, so their plants are at index*2 to index*2+1
    std::vector<std::string> result;

        if (c == 'G') {
            result.push_back("grass");

                result.push_back("clover");

                if (c == 'R') {
                    result.push_back("radishes");

                        result.push_back("violets");
                    }
                }
            }

    }

                        result.push_back("violets");
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    
    return result;
}
